column3: I make spaces that are calm rather than confrontational. I seek a certain kind of logic that allows you to move in space and perceive it as beautiful and rational. Clarity is a worthwhile quality.
In just six weeks from the time the design was started, we had the motor on the block testing its power.
A good designer must rely on experience, on precise, logic thinking; and on pedantic exactness. No magic will do.
Design is not for philosophy it's for life.
To whom does design address itself: to the greatest number, to the specialist of an enlightened matter, to a privileged social class? Design addresses itself to the need.
Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because they get overcome by the beauty of the picture - and forget that merchandise must be sold.
What is design? It's where you stand with a foot in two worlds - the world of technology and the world of people and human purposes - and you try to bring the two together.
Design is directed toward human beings. To design is to solve human problems by identifying them and executing the best solution.
We design our world, while our world acts back on us and designs us.
